title: how do i report someone post game for abuse
body: so i got a friend request post game and wasn't thinking about it much just assumed it was a friends smurf or something and then i got bombarded with this hate and all kinds of dreadful thoughts and words from a player that i latter realised was from my previous game who was a latter pick and i had taken his role (he proceeded to feed and no do well getting on tilt, i gave him benefit of the doubt about all this) and i don't know how to report him for this abuse because there appears to be no way in doing so i have still got screen shots of everything as evidence however i don't know what more i can do

replies.body: At the top of the page there's a button labelled "support". This will take to to the support section of the site where you can submit a support ticket (button at the top labelled "submit a request"). There's no option relating to player behaviour (Riot, please) but I usually just go with "Game and Features - General Questions" and the support staff will forward it to the player behaviour team.
thank you so much i tried that earlier and it felt like i was getting no where
